*.draft_dirt_track_00_text: Compacted dirt road. Cheap, but slow to move on. Great for rural areas.
*.draft_complex_industri_portTerrain_text: Some decal tiles for styling the ground and piers in your port
*.draft_master_harbour_up1_text: Place it to start developing a harbour in your city.
*.draft_master_harbour_up2_text: Expand the office and accomodate more powerful ports.
*.draft_master_harbour_up3_text: Expand the office and accomodate even more powerful ports.
*.draft_wood_industri_wood_port_text: Use it to import Lumber from other countries. This is more expensive but produces lumber faster.
*.draft_wood_industri_plank_port_text: Use it to import Planks from other countries. This is more expensive but produces lumber faster.
*.draft_generic_warehouse_template_text: All kinds of resources can be stored here, but it's not as efficient as dedicated warehouses.
*.draft_wood_industri_furnitureStore_text: This market can be used to sell your Furniture products to the locals. Maximum amount a furniture market can sell is: 1/8 of poor population + 1/4 of middle population + 1/2 of rich population.
*.draft_wood_industri_furniture_text: This facility can produce various Furniture out of processed Planks and some Paper.
*.draft_wood_industri_logging_text: Provides your industrial complex with Lumber ready for processing. It can be further refined to greatly increase profits.
*.draft_wood_industri_papermill_text: Produces large rolls of Paper. Requires a constant supply of Lumber.
*.draft_wood_industri_planks_text: Processes freshly cut Lumber into useable Planks.
*.draft_wood_industri_up1_text: The management heart of the woodworking industry. Place it to start developing the related industry branch in your city.
*.draft_wood_industri_wood_warehouse_text: Can only store Lumber, but it's much more efficient than general warehouses.
*.draft_wood_industri_planks_warehouse_tex: Can only store Planks, but it's much more efficient than general warehouses.
*.draft_wood_industri_printingpress_text: Uses Paper to print Books and Press.
*.industri_WAREHOUSE_FULL_text: This warehouse is filled up and cant store any more resources.
*.industri_NO_RESOURCE_SELECTED_text: No resource has been selected for this warehouse yet, so it cannot function.
*.industri_INPUT_EMPTY_text: At least one input of this factory does not have enough resource to work.
*.industri_OUTPUT_FULL_text: All outputs of your factory are full! This is actually a good thing.
*.industri_SUPPLY_NOT_MET_text: The building does not have road access, or lacks power/water.
